toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_itemno__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The time, in days, required to convert a requisition for this item into a purchase order. This time is used by MRP for planning purposes. 'Checked' uses the PO commodity code value displayed, 'unchecked' uses the value entered in the provided field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Requisition Convert
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_ltreqcnvrtpo__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The number of days from the date of firming the requisition until the requisition is converted to a purchase order. If checkbox is checked, the Commodity Code value is used; if unchecked, an override must be entered.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Requisition Convert Ind
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_ltreqcnvrtpoind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The time, in days, required by the vendor to have this item available to ship. This time is used by MRP for planning purposes and is included in overall lead time.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Vendor
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_ltvend__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The time, in days, required by the vendor to have this item available to ship. This time is used by MRP for planning purposes and is included in overall lead time. Checked indicates use CC value. Unchecked means use value manually entered in next field.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Lead Time, Vendor Ind
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_ltvendind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Other Direct Charge (ODC) codes are used in the Purchasing process for Indirect, Service, Travel or Miscellaneous expenses. They are set up and maintained on the ODC Code Maintenance table.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: ODC ID
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_odcid__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__poitem__c.rstk__poitem_odcid__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>This field is the Other Direct Charge ID This field can be null If the POITEM_TYPE # ‘I’ and POITEM_TYPE # ‘V’ this field is disabled and must be null If the POITEM_TYPE = ‘I’ (indirect) or the POITEM_TYPE = ‘V’ (service), then this field is enabled and can be filled in with a value from the SYODC table. It can also be null if the discrete tracking is not desired. If filled in from the SYODC table then the SYODC_TYPE must be: If the POITEM_TYPE = ‘I’ (indirect material) ‘L’ for travel Or ‘I’ for Indirect Material Expenses If the POITEM_TYPE = ‘V’ (service) ‘S’ for Service For a project control environment and the ‘non home’ project, there can be project costs added to the appropriate PJPROJCST ODC field in the case of a: Reimbursement for an Employee Reimbursable Expense The receipt of an Indirect Material Item The authorization of Service or Indirect Material The PO – AP Match for any price differences.(DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>Other Direct Charge (ODC) codes are used in the Purchasing process for Indirect, Service, Travel or Miscellaneous expenses. toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Indicates if PO item can be over-received.. If not, the PO Qty must be increased before an over-receipt is allowed. If the PO CC value is used, the left box is checked and right box indicates cc value. Uncheck to override the cc value.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Over Receipt Indicator
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_overrcptind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Indicates if PO item can be over-received.. If not, the PO Qty must be increased before an over-receipt is allowed. If the PO CC value is used, the left box is checked and right box indicates cc value. Uncheck left box to override the cc value.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Over Receipt Indicator Ind
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_overrcptindind__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, PO Print will print Engineering Notes for the Item on a PO line.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Print Engineering Item Notes
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_poprint_engitemnotes__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, PO Print will print Engineering Revision Notes for the current revision of the Item on a PO line.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Print Engineering Item Rev Notes
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_poprint_engitemrevnotes__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, PO Print will print notes attached to the Purchase Item Master for the Item on a PO line.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Print Purchasing Item Notes
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_poprint_puritemnotes__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Specifies the decimal precision used for PO quantity. For example, an entry of 3 indicates the PO quantity will be held in 3 decimals of precision. If checkbox is checked, the Commodity Code value is used; if unchecked, an override must be set.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_qtydecimal__c

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__poitem_qtydecimalind__c
